messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

error thursday task has assigned hi please call include thank regards wednesday pm task has assigned hello please update kind regards analyst ext hub wednesday pm re task has assigned same problem occurs again modify shows error date tuesday task has assigned hello please advised has deleted kindly re submit make good assistance please hesitate kind regards analyst priority moderate assignment location ref msg
